title: For crew and passenger comfort, the air going into the cabin…
caption_en: For crew and passenger comfort, the air going into the cabin and cockpit is cooled. This air is also used for cabin pressurization. The air-conditioning system uses the bleed air from the engines or APU and is available both on ground and in flight. _

title: The air-conditioning system consists of a cooling system, a …
caption_en: The air-conditioning system consists of a cooling system, a temperature control system and a distribution system. The major components are located in the tailcone section while the system control switches and the temperature contro switches are located in front of the co-pilot. J _

title: We will be using this schematic when describing the air-cond…
caption_en: We will be using this schematic when describing the air-conditioning system in this lesson. J _
